name: Firestarter (itch) (Snowdrama)
description:
Save the city from it's inevitable overpopulation, burn it down!

You've woken up to the realization that the city has be growing really rapidly. If it grows too large the whole cities' economy could collapse! So you've come up with a plan... "Incentivize" the people to move out or to not move in... by burning their homes! Save the city from itself, by keeping it from growing too large! But be warned, burning too much might have the opposite effect! Avoid the cops who are trying to arrest you for arson, and keep burning to keep the city in perfect balance!

Keyboard Controls:
  • WASD or Arrow Keys - Move
  • Space - Burn Building
  • Esc - Open Menu
  • Mouse for Menus
Gamepad Controls(Xbox Mapping):
  • Analog Stick - Move
  • A - Burn House
  • Start - Open Menu
  • Mouse for Menus(Didn’t have time to iron out Gamepad UI support)
